Items.Name: Vacuum
Items.Description: To be compatible with Geant4, it is defined as hidrogen at extremely low density (similar to G4_galactic). Can be considered to be completely transparent for all particles.

Items.Name: B4C
Items.Description: Composition and enrichment is provided by the ESS Detector Coatings Workshop for the samples ordered by LIP-Coimbra

Items.Name: Soda-lime glass
Items.Description: This type of glass does not contain boron. It is commonly used for production of window panes is often called 'float glass'
